extendedInfo.description: If you are Cover Drive's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Cover Drive's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Cover Drive's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Cover Drive's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Bajan Style-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - All About You- Bajan Style (Intro)- Bajan Style (Outro)- Can't Live In A World- Explode- Headphones- Hurricane- I Know You Too Well- Lick Ya Down- No Breaks- Sparks- That Girl- Twilight- Wrongside
